activities.name: Stress Meter
activities.activity_info: Takes a quiz of the user and gives a number on the scale of 10 (SGPA). The next quiz will update the SGPA into CSGPA.

activities.name: Fidget Spinner
activities.activity_info:
Includes two fidgeting activities: Tap/Tap and Random Tap.Fidget spinners can be a helpful tool for stress management, especially in reducing anxiety and aiding focus. Hereâ€™s why:

    Distraction from Stress: Fidget spinners can break the cycle of rumination by providing a simple distraction, helping to shift focus away from stressful thoughts.

    Promotes Mindfulness: The repetitive motion can help individuals enter a meditative state, aiding relaxation and reducing stress, especially for those who struggle with traditional meditation.

    Improves Focus: For people with ADHD, fidget spinners help channel excess energy, potentially improving concentration and reducing stress.

    Comfort in Repetition: They provide a comforting repetitive action, especially for individuals with ADHD or autism, offering a calming outlet.

    Normalizes Fidgeting: Fidget spinners can make fidgeting socially acceptable, reducing stigma and helping individuals feel less self-conscious.

    Personal Stress Relief: For many, fidget spinners provide immediate relief, offering a low-effort way to manage stress and anxiety.

  While not a replacement for therapy, fidget spinners can be an effective tool for stress relief for those who find them helpful.
